document.full_text: tomtom, which provides fleet management systems to trucking firms, expects smaller rivals to go out of business in the fragmented sector in the next three to five years, an executive said on friday.
document.title: tomtom sees fleet management services growth
lines_and_colors: tomtom, which provides fleet management systems to trucking firms, expects smaller rivals to go out of business in the fragmented sector in the next three to five years, an executive said on friday.
